headlines.description: — James Maddison scored for the third successive game as Leicester twice came from behind to salvage a 2-2 draw at Southampton in the Premier League on Wednesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Maddison recovers Leicester's 2-2 draw at Southampton in EPL

headlines.description: Chelsea remain top of the Premier League as winger Hakim Ziyech scored a winner to help claim a 2-1 victory over Watford on Wednesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ziyech nets winner as Chelsea edge Watford

events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at West Ham United

headlines.description: — Neal Maupay scored with an overhead kick in the 89th minute to give Brighton a 1-1 draw at West Ham in the Premier League on Wednesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Maupay's overhead kick earns Brighton 1-1 draw at West Ham

headlines.description: Goals from Ruben Dias and Bernardo Silva helped Manchester City to a 2-1 win at Aston Villa in a pulsating Premier League clash on Wednesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Silva nets stunner as Man City edge Aston Villa

headlines.description: Mohamed Salah scored twice as Liverpool beat Everton in the Merseyside derby on Wednesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Salah, Liverpool beat Everton in Merseyside rout
